name: Welcome Back Daddy
description:
Coming back home as a father is not an easy thing sometimes. You had a tough time at your office and you just want to sit back and relax at your new home. Next thing you know, you got your family against you. How long can you keep your sanity?

Game Features:
• This game is NOT meant to be easy. It is for challengers.
• The gameplay is quick and strategic.
• Playtime will depend on the skill of the player.
• The story can be ambiguous, but the story is scattered around in pieces.
• Please don't be a chicken and use headphones. :)
• Secret ending
